2018/06/08 14天售出166萬4041張專輯，奪得「月專輯排行榜」冠軍 — 創下Gaon統計史上「單月最高銷售紀錄」

2018/07/15 《Love Yourself 轉 'Tear'》以175萬117張的銷量摘下「2018上半年專輯榜」冠軍

2018/08/09 世界巡唱加場，成為首個能在美國花旗球場(4萬席)舉行演唱會的韓國歌手

2018/08/10 《Love Yourself 轉 'Tear'》日本銷售超過10萬張 — 日本唱片協會-黃金認證

2018/08/12 2018 Teen Choice Awards— Choice International Artist (連續第2年)

2018/08/15 第三度獲得美國唱片業協會(RIAA)金獎認證 + Billboard Social 50 連續57週位居冠軍

2018/08/24 〈IDOL〉超過4500萬次觀看次數 — 成為Youtube上全球影片中首日最多觀看次數的MV

2018/09/02（美國時間），特別專輯《Love Yourself 結 'Answer'》繼正規三輯後第二度登上Billboard 200榜首，創下了韓國歌手連續兩次拿下該榜第一位的紀錄。《Love Yourself 結 'Answer'》發行首週於美國本土賣出了18萬5000張，刷新了正規三輯《Love Yourself 轉 'Tear'》所創下13萬5000張的紀錄

2018/09/20，防彈少年團去年9月發行的迷你五輯《Love Yourself 承 'Her'》主打歌〈DNA〉音樂錄影帶突破5億觀看次數，成為韓國團體史上最初以及最快破五億的歌曲

2018/10/08，南韓總統府青瓦台宣布將頒發「文化勳章」於防彈少年團，以表揚防彈少年團對拓展韓流、促進流行文化發展有功。]防彈少年團是首個獲頒文化勳章的韓國團體，更是年紀最輕的受勳者。

2018/10/10，防彈少年團於2018年全美音樂獎頒獎典禮，獲頒最受歡迎社群網站藝人獎，成為了首個於全美音樂獎獲獎的韓國團體。10月18日，Big Hit娛樂宣布與防彈少年團續約7年。

2018/11/05，防彈少年團於2018年MTV歐洲音樂大獎頒獎典禮，獲頒「最佳團體」及「最大粉絲團」兩個獎項

2018/11/20，防彈少年團的首部電影紀錄片《Burn The Stage: The Movie》首週觀影人數已經超過140萬人次，打破了紀錄片觀影人數的冠軍成績

2018/12/05，Billboard在網站上公布了2018年的年度總結榜單，防彈少年團登上年度〈Top Artist〉中的第8位，更登上〈Top Artist-Duo/Group〉榜單第2，並橫掃〈Independent Artist〉、〈Social 50 Artist〉及〈World Album〉等榜單的冠軍

2018/12/07，美國《TIME》的「2018年世界最大影響力人物」投票中，防彈少年團獲得了9%投票率奪得第一位。[193]2018年發行的正規三輯《Love Yourself 轉 'Tear'》入圍了第61屆《葛萊美獎》的最佳唱片設計包裝獎。

2018/12/08，據《Gaon音樂榜》11月銷量數據中顯示，防彈少年團的專輯累積銷量已達1002萬3081張，是2000年後出道歌手中，專輯銷量最快突破1000萬張的歌手，自2013年出道後僅花費5年6個月即達成紀錄。且防彈少年團在今年1月至11月已賣出500萬3455張專輯，單是《Love Yourself 結 'Answer'》便賣出216萬9519張，是Gaon創榜以來錄得最高銷量的專輯及今年賣出最多專輯的歌手。

2018/12/12，2018年Mnet亞洲音樂大獎日本場中，防彈少年團獲得5個獎項並包括大獎「全球年度藝人」。更於12月14日的香港場中，再獲得5個獎項並包括2個大獎「年度專輯」和「年度藝人」，共計10個獎項

防彈少年團（방탄소년단），簡稱BTS，韓國男子音樂組合，由Jin、SUGA、J-hope、Rap Monster、Jimin、V、Jung Kook七名成員組成，隸屬Big Hit娛樂經紀公司旗下。為Big Hit娛樂第一個獨立製作培養的團體，同時也是知名作曲人與製作人方時赫首次獨立栽培的團體。

團體剛出道時，防彈少年團的涵義為「阻擋像子彈一樣的批評與時代偏見的音樂團體」，2017年7月4日則加入了「不安於現狀，朝著夢想不斷成長的青春」的涵義，原先以「防彈少年團」為英文縮寫的「BTS」（Bangtan Sonyeon Dan），也增添了「Beyond The Scene」超越現狀的意思。

防彈少年團的官方歌迷名稱為「A.R.M.Y」（韓語：아미），這個名稱是在2013年7月9日通過官方網站首度亮相，來自於英文「Adorable Representative M.C for Youth」的縮寫，意指「值得人們景仰的青年代表」，由防彈少年團的成員們閱讀約1000個粉絲意見後親自選出。ARMY在英語裏的意思是軍隊，而防彈衣和軍隊總是在一起，所以也有粉絲們和防彈少年團一直在一起的意思。官方應援物為炸彈造型的手燈「A.R.M.Y BOMB」。

I saw Army live at Tokyo Dome Stadium which was marvelous and unforgettable. They've been strutting their stuff.since they were children so don't sell them short. At the end of the last encore they bowed onstage soaking up the applause. They received a standing ovation and thunderous applause. The group and the dancers and acrobats who were invited to perform gave a superb performance. The choreography, the stage design and lighting design and the glow sticks were magnificent and fulfilled our expectations. On top of being an incredible musician the singer Jin is also an avid runner. He took part in a five hundred meter race where he came first. He rose to the occasion, ran for all he was worth and dived over the finish line passing the runners who were ahead of him earlier. His family and loads of fans congratulated him on winning the race.as he held the trophy up. The race was the opportunity for all the best male runners in tokyo to strut their stuff. It was truly memorable. Yesterday I assigned four hours for practicing their songs on my bassoon, contrabassoon, trumpet, cornet  trombone and euphonium. I practised with my friends who played glockenspiel, marimba, xylophone, vibraphone, timpani (kettle-drum), chimes and celesta, all of which has definite pitch. Adding these instruments makes the music more rhythmic. Saxophone, cor anglais (english horn) and clarinet are transposing instruments. Saxophone, clarinet and bass clarinet are single reed instruments whereas oboe, cor anglais, bassoon and contrabassoon are double reed instruments. Flute is a reedless instruments. My friend Joe isn't very well-to-do whereas his girlfriend's family is very well-off. Last week he threw a party where cheap wines were served. The sofas in his apartment are made of some cheap material. His television is cheap and nasty. Recently he bought some clothes on the cheap from a store that's about to go into liquidation. He bought a pair of cheap trainers that fell apart after a couple months so I bought him a pair of good quality sneakers. He's too mean to buy new shoes. He's very cheap with the air conditioner too- it's only on for an hour each day then he turns on the fans and opens the windows but the air conditioner was dirt cheap. Last month he vacationed in macau but he's so cheap he didn't even buy us postcards. He stayed in a three star hotel where it serves cheap and cheerful food and sells cheap and cheerful clothes. He's a bassoon teacher. He explained to us regarding a piece by Bach "this passage should be played beautifully rather than rhythmically. Otherwise it's a bit cheap." I saw lots of his pencil Mark's on the score such as: cantabile, silence, no.pause here, just separate, clean.pedal, more melodic voicing, remain soft, quiet, hear tenor, clearer, articulate, in time, silvery soft, gentler, take time.... Regarding teaching he said "I prefer payment in blocks. My students pay monthly or pay for four lessons at a time. For this month you can pay on a lesson-by-lesson basis because maybe you wanna see what it's like to have lessons. From next month onwards pay monthly. He asked me to get him some haydn scores as I can get them on the cheap from a friend of mine. We watched a kickboxing fight in which Paul hit chris with a cheap shot after he lost to chris. We watched a comedy show as well which was full of cheap laughs. The comedian is famous for his vulgar manner and wearing a vulgar suit. His grandfather was a cheap gangster and liar. His jokes and jibes were cheap and vulgar.
